name: Hellfire Havoc
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #54: Curses

The game doesn't have a solid game loop. The procedural generation turned out decent, especially considering I'd never done 2D level generation before. The deal with the devil is lackluster. There aren't any massive differences between the web and desktop build. Desktop will be nicer of course, but game-play is almost identical. For some reason it'll only download through the itch.io app, at least for me.

By:
  • RancidMilk: Programming and Engine Work
  • MHS: Music and SFX
  • arbiter202: Visual Art
Other used assets:
  • https://arks.itch.io/witchcraft-spritesheet
  • https://brullov.itch.io/fire-animation
  • https://beast-pixels.itch.io/overworld-tileset-grass-biome
